title: Pixel 5 - Only Chrome can access microphone
content:
Has anyone ever seen an issue where a device (specifically Pixel 5) where only Chrome can access the microphone or bluetooth mics?  Here are the details:

- Updated to January 2021 security patch seems to have caused the issue
- No applications besides websites in Chrome can access audio
- Can't make phone calls using phone or bluetooth headset
- Can't record audio using phone or bluetooth headset
- Performed factory reset at request of support, and still doesn't work

At this point, it seems related to the January 2021 security patch.  Support wasn't overly helpful except for suggesting a device swap.

Has anyone else seen anything like this?  Any suggestions would be highly appreciated.
